messages.subject: Contact for Lee Sadderwhite
messages.msgSnippet: Anyone have contact info for Lee Sadderwhite? He was at the Tampa show selling tsuba, but left Saturday. I know he doesn t have email. Email me privately. If
messages.messageBody:
Anyone have contact info for Lee Sadderwhite?
He was at the Tampa show selling tsuba, but left Saturday.
I know he doesn't have email.

Email me privately. If he is a reclusive sort- I'm fine giving my contact information for someone to give to him. He can call or mail me.

Curran
Sarasota, FL






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
